name: Basic Private Motor Car
desc: This auto product is designed for private car owners with basic insurance expectations.

coverages.name: Third Party Liability
coverages.desc: Necessary and reasonable reimbursement for bodily injury or death of third party in a car accident.

coverages.name: Own Auto Damage
coverages.desc: The cost of physical loss or damage to insured vehicle and its accessories.

coverages.name: Theft
coverages.desc: Cover the risks of vehicle or its parts being stolen.

coverages.name: Personal Accident to Driver
coverages.desc: Necessary and reasonable reimbursement for bodily injury or death of driver in the insured vehicle.

coverages.name: Window Breakage
coverages.desc: The compensation for unexpected breaks of the car windows.

coverages.name: Scrape
coverages.desc: The repairs to insured vehicle from the small shallow cuts.

coverages.name: Self-ignition
coverages.desc: Cover the risks of natural heating or spontaneous combustion.
